website_summaries.verdict: A thermos favorite for those who want unique and efficient  pouring options when traveling.
pros: Many options for serving: comes with a pour spout, a hand pump, and a removable lid
Long-lasting stainless steel build keeps drinks cold for 24 hours and hot for 12
cons: A few customers wished the pump dispensed more liquid
Better at keeping drinks cool than hot

customer_reviews.title: Great disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The size is great and the pump works great, but the whole purpose is to keep the contents hot and it doesn't.UPDATE: This pot was replaced free of charge and free shipping with a new pot.......The new one works great and I am very happy. These folks went out of their way to make it right and that alone is worth a lot, but I got great air pot too!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good product, looks good and works well. Kept tea hot for about 4-5 hours as far as as I could tell. It held about 20 cups or more. Pouring hot tea into it was challenging, has a narrow mouth. I should have used a funnel or something. Cleaning was easy.Will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sonika

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for - this is the best quality on the market and a great price. I ordered two more as we have large events at our home that require keeping coffee hot. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great carafe
customer_reviews.text: Awesome carafe. My sister recently found the carafe I borrowed from her 8 years ago and wanted it back! You'd think she'd have forgotten by now, but no, she didn't. Anyway, I had to get a new one and this was perfect. If fits about two pots of coffee and kept it hot most of the day. I would recommend this to everyone and will Probably get another pretty soon.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Well made airpot at an excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made, not flashy, sturdy airpot. It works well at keeping coffee hot in my busy office. The steel liner means I never have to worry about someone else breaking it like the glass lined one I used to have. Customer service is excellent with a real, live human being asking if the shipment arrived in good shape and was available to answer any questions I might have.
customer_reviews.author: KPinVT

customer_reviews.title: Preheat and you will LOVE this airpot.
customer_reviews.text: These airpots work as advertised! they are stainless lined, no glass inserts. Therefore they are very durable but do require preheating with hot water for a couple minutes before use. After preheating, they seem to keep coffee hot for several hours. We use 4 of them in our church lobby every Sunday for 4-5 hours. they have been working flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: DaPreach

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly, nicely packaged. Perfect size for what we needed. Actually ordered 3 for our event of approximately 40 people and only had to refill one once. Very simple to use. Easy to clean. Edited to add: they’re also on swivel bases so they can be turned without moving.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cardoza

customer_reviews.title: Great for long trips
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product for long trips or taking to the beach. We recently had a 10 hour trip to our cabin with 2 kids. We used the Airpot in hopes it would keep the water chilled. By the time we got there I could not tell the difference from when we first poured the water in from when we got to our destination. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product that keeps my coffee hot.
customer_reviews.text: The carafe can hold 14 cups of coffee. I pre-heat the thermos with hot tap water for 15-30 min. Empty water and pour freshly. made coffee in. I bring to work to share and if I have left overs, it is still very hot when I get home 10 hours later. Will be good to use for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Lafortune

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT & EFFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the coffee carafe so far! I love how it looks and it does an excellent job insulating. Cresimo has really high quality products - I also just purchased their barware set and love it. I will definitely be giving these as gifts for Christmas and bridal showers moving forward. Can't say enough great things about Cresimo!
customer_reviews.author: KLH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Coffee Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Coffee dispenser. We bought this for a huge class of electric engineering. The students loved having coffee all day. It’ kept warm from 7 am to 6 pm.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Turner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Chilly-Weather Parties and Tailgating
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this thermos! It was perfect for the chilly tailgating days for football -- kept the hot chocolate and coffee we were serving obscenely hot. Just follow the directions that come with the thermos for "pre-heating" it, and it works like a charm. Not to mention the awesome pump-action serving handle makes this thermos super convenient for serving lots of people in a short amount of time. Holds a lot of liquid and keeps it roasting hot - Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Junk. I own a small coffee trailer and accidentally broke one of my curtis airpots sp I bought this one because it had good reviews. Bummed. Bad choice. This airpot is low quality, it doesn't keep the coffee hot for very long. I'm going to order another curtis airpot right now. You should too.
customer_reviews.author: ruski

customer_reviews.title: I also like that the base swivels
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes stronger coffee than I do. This has solved our 2 pot problem plus it is so handy for parties. The lever is easier to use than a pump. I also like that the base swivels. Great purchase! Shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Ethel

customer_reviews.title: Great for a party - keeps liquids hot for hours.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. I had considered renting something similar for a party and the cost was almost the same and now I have it for future use. Very easy to use and clean and kept the coffee hot for many hours. Just be careful pouring the coffee into the carafe as it will spill over if you dont go slow and are not careful. I may consider getting a funnel, but really not necessary, i was just in a hurry to fill and it caused a bit of a mess. Don’t hesitate to purchase, well worth the price. I got both a small and a large by the way and they are both great.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thermos for a breakfast program I started for children, unfortunately when I opened the package, this was what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Anna-Kay Chow

customer_reviews.title: Second Review -- Great Service
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for many months and then it stopped holding heat for more than 6 hours. I contacted them a few days after the one-year warranty was up and they replaced it anyway. They got me the replacement almost instantly. I sent them the email telling them the problem and within two or three days I had received my replacement. That is great service. The lever action is better than a push button. I have another one very old made of plastic and it is taller, a tad narrower, but it only holds about 1.8 liters, this holds full 3 liters. Just started using it today. Came very quickly, like one day.
customer_reviews.author: Iwasthere

customer_reviews.title: After 2 hrs it’ll cry for a jacket
customer_reviews.text: * bleep bleep bleep 🤬 Shnap!!! They got me. Let me save the rest of you with my sacrificial purchase. Run for the hills it’s warmer then the pot. Lucky if it stays hot more than an hour and warm more than two. Bought this for beach days for instant noodles & to make Hot chocolate when it gets breezy; fat chance if I want the food hot. I’m so bummed ☹️
customer_reviews.author: H.T

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hot water warm
customer_reviews.text: You know this thing is good when you pour boiling water into it, close the lid, but the container doesn't feel hot on the outside. This means the insulation is working well. You can detach the lid completely. But I am worried that if I do it a lot, then the lid won't stay down. The handle is fine to carry the airpot when it's empty. I don't recommend using the handle when it's full of water. I intend to use this only for boiling water so I won't have to worry about scrubbing it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ng

customer_reviews.title: Great! Wonderful! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered 2 and one was broken on the inside where the pump was (plastic surrounding the top pump mechanism on the lid was cracked and broken. I didn’t notice until I had filled it up and began to use it and the whole part broke off however I was able to use it for a Christmas party that day. I was also able to replace it very quickly so thank you very much! Both are so wonderful and easy to use! I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did a test
customer_reviews.text: Well I did a little test for warmth. Filled my thermos with hot water for 10 min. Then filled it with boiling water at 10am, put it in the cold breezeway and checked it 12 hours later. Still hot! Checked at 24 hrs., still hot. Checked it at 30 hours and it was still warm. Guess it will do the trick. Ordered a second.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie

customer_reviews.title: We use it for everything!!
customer_reviews.text: This thermos is high quality and we use it for EVERYTHING! Our family hosts a lot, so this has been used for baby showers, wedding showers, and even in between! We also use it when we just need to travel and keep things warm. The pump is also perfect so the coffee comes out at a good speed. 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Airpots kept tea hot for hours!
customer_reviews.text: These pots (I bought two) kept tea warm for hours - long enough for hot beverages through the length of a book signing where I served a cream tea. I did warm them first with hot water before I put the tea in, and I believe that helped. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time, works as advertised, competitively priced.
customer_reviews.text: this air pot arrived on time, good quality, works as advertised and competitively priced. I found that following the instructions that this carafe will keep your coffee warm for 12 hours. It is well built and rugged, although I have not tried a four foot drop onto concrete. It is good quality and will definitely meet our needs . Our house used 8 pounds of coffee a month, so this will definitely help to stretch our coffee instead making a fresh pot every time.
customer_reviews.author: Byron J. Guidry

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Keep Coffee Hot for Very Long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement to my Thermos brand Airpot . It is a nice looking product, but it does not keep my coffee hot for hours and hours like the old one did. By noon, the coffee is lukewarm. This doesn't work for me. I like to brew a pot early morning and drink coffee all day. It dispenses coffee nicely and is easy to clean. I just wouldn't recommend it if you want it for all day HOT coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This airpot did what I wanted it to: kept coffee really hot and held a good amount of coffee. I am concerned about cleaning it over time since you can't get your hand in the opening, but if I ever need to do a deep clean, I will buy a bottle brush or something.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Better at home then the road.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t regret buying it. I probably wouldn’t buy again. We purchased it for a long road trip , and yes it nice being able to have java without pouring hot liquid while in the car, but we are going back to a good ole thermos type container. It kept the java acceptable as far as warmth. But meh , we now use it for get togethers at the house. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermos! I used it for hot cider on Halloween, and the leftover cider was still too hot to swallow the next day. It is a breeze to clean and the stainless steel doesn't hold odors. I like to fill it with coffee in the morning for all-day use: much better than letting the beverage sit on the coffee maker's hotplate, and handy to take out into the shop.
customer_reviews.author: charles w.

customer_reviews.title: Cannot fill with milk products (no hot chocolate).
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take hot chocolate to football games. Description says all beverage types. HOWEVER, instructions enclosed warn against using any milk products due to risk of bacteria! 😥 I used hot water and instant cocoa, but it just wasn't the same as homemade, and less convenient. Update: I'm going to use this for cocoa anyway and just be sure to wash it really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased 3 of these Airpots. I bought them to cater to family and friends on 2 upcoming events this month. They look and feel to be made of good quality. They look professional grade. I tested them before using them for the first time on 10/10/18. They seem to work very well when I tested them. I really like the size capacity and the price. I have seen same 108 fl oz size for twice the price, I have also seen 2 liter size for the price I bought these ones for. I really recommend buying this Airpots to anyone. Delivery was very fast, well packed and customer service was great from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Juan M.

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job, mostly easy to clean, but spills easily
customer_reviews.text: I pre-heated and filled with hot chocolate. 5 hours later it was still hot (not the same temp it was at the beginning but still hot enough that you had to sip it, not drink it). My biggest complaint is that if it's laid on it's side, it leaks big time. I lost half my content last time because someone knocked it over for a few minutes without realizing it. It's mostly easy to clean but it takes a little work to get your liquid out of all the places it flows through. It's great that the whole flip top is removable, but it's fairly hard to do.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lovett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our camping party
customer_reviews.text: This product turned out to be even better than I'd hoped. We were able to measure exactly how many pumps of hot water would be needed for each packet of hot cocoa. The pot itself is very durable and easy to use, we had small kids and adults both using it without any trouble or tipping over. I'm very happy I chose this one over the many other options.
customer_reviews.author: MandiGutterRose

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for hot chocolate and used it today for the first time at a baby shower. Normally, I make it in a crock pot and serve with a ladle. This was so much better!! It worked perfect and kept the hot chocolate hot the whole time! It was easy to clean, as well.
customer_reviews.author: briwig08

customer_reviews.title: So i'm not at all happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Will not keep hot for more than a couple of hours. I fill almost full with boiling water for at least a half an hour then fill with coffee at 190 degrees it will drop in temp. 15 degrees every hour so after only part of the day im looking at luke warm coffee. Not at all as advertised. So i'm not at all happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: larry norton

customer_reviews.title: Failed to retain heat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to hold hot water for making coffee or tea. After warming the pot, I put in boiled water. The outside of the pot started getting hot so I know the unit was not able to keep the heat of the water. The water should be hot for at least 12 hours, but was cold after 6 hours. Returned to amazon. I will purchase one with glass lining instead.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Lady

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, stays Hot all day!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the automatic shut off after two hours on my coffee pot(pain!). I work out of my home office and sometimes I'd forget to turn the coffee pot back on. Nothing more disgusting than cold coffee! This was my solution!!! I make a full pot in the morning, I pour the pot into the Airpot and my coffee stays hot all day long! It has a pump. No mess, no lifting the entire pot!! You simply pump your hot coffee into your cup and back to work you go! It has stayed hot from 7am until 4:30pm ( if there is any left). I simply love it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna McLain

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: We received this in good order and time. We have used it once but it worked great. Dispenses smoothly & kept the coffee hot for the time we needed it to...ie about 3 hours. It is a bit hard to clean or rinse out but nothing bad enough to keep us from getting another one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: South40

customer_reviews.title: Prepare for use, and this is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: So I decided to test this, I am extremely happy with the results. I boiled water filled canister sealed and let sit. i prepared my coffee and filled the canister with coffe. It held two 12 cup capacity pots. I am happy to report it lasted 9 hours coffee was still hot. I am sure this will serve well. Cleaning is somewhat difficult, top opens but does not come off. You need a bottle sponge to clean properly. they instruct to dry, and store open. sound advice, taken.
customer_reviews.author: RnR311

customer_reviews.title: High quality for low price!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality for this low of a price. Held heat of our coffee for hours. Great for having friends and family over the house. Would have no problem recommending this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I expect it to last years.
customer_reviews.text: We had a similar smaller pot for the last several years and it has worked very well but was showing its age. This carafe is a bigger brother and if you follow the directions in pre-temping the pot it will keep beverages cold or hot. Also pumping harder really doesn't help, just pump with steady force and just to let you know the spout likes to drip one drop after I take the cup away and that is the only down side. I'd give it five stars but it is too early yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tomzee

customer_reviews.title: Great for office: FOLLOW DIRECTIONS FOR BEST RESULTS
customer_reviews.text: I love this pot. the office loves it as well. My office has now become the coffee shop. The having to put hot water in before is a little much but for the way that is keeps, it makes sense. Anyway, I highly recommend this product. FOLLOW DIRECTIONS FOR BEST RESULTS
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Bethea

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m a little concerned about how long it will last, the plunger part seems a little cheaply made, it’s working well so far. It’s been a couple months of daily light use. This doesn’t keep the coffee warm for longer than maybe an hour... it’s going under the counter, maybe it’ll be better for cold items. I won’t be using it in my business anymore... nothing like a customer returning a coffee because it’s Luke warm, yuck.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Tancredi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product to use at our church for outreach on the street and for functions we have at our church. These functions last between and hour and four hours long. The coffee and tea we are making is hot from start to finish. The pump works great. Depending on the cup size it is one or two squirts to fill the cup. We have an old style baby bottle brush that we use with soapy water to clean the inside of the carafe. It only takes a couple minutes and you are done.
customer_reviews.author: Gervais Barger

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this.  It doesn't work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It looked nice. However, the first one lasted about a month and stopped keeping things warm even with preheat. It was returned. The second one lasted less than a week and stopped keeping things warm. The outside of the container was hot but not the inside. I has reported this to the company and nothing has been done nor have I heard anything from them in three weeks. Don't buy it. I think it is because there is a very flimsy closure with no lock down as in other thermos products of this type. It was a great disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: gerald

customer_reviews.title: Great thermal carafe
customer_reviews.text: I had a different brand before that had a glass inside that I broke. This carafe is stainless inside and hopefully will withstand the test of time. I used this only once so far and it kept my coffee hot for 12 hours. At that point the coffee was gone. The pump action is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: saibo

customer_reviews.title: Keeps beverage hot all day
customer_reviews.text: I tested this over the weekend. I pre-warmed it as instructed by filling it up with hot water and left it for 30 minutues. Then dumped the hot water out and filled it with coffee around 10 am. At the end of the day when i emptied it out to wash it, the coffee was still hot. So it kept my coffee hot for more than 8 hours
customer_reviews.author: Persiangem

customer_reviews.title: Good but top is tricky
customer_reviews.text: The pot was great for holding and dispensing coffee but the lid was insanely hard to remove. You have to push in this tiny, very stiff tab on the back to remove the top. It was so difficult that it broke off and I returned it. If you don’t care about taking the top off to clean it then this is a good product. If, like me, removing the lid is important to you, I’m not sure I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for coffee service for the office. Looks very nice and performs well.
customer_reviews.author: GeneK

customer_reviews.title: Works great, cleans up easily
customer_reviews.text: These pots are great! I hosted a party yesterday with a coffee and hot chocolate bar. Both beverages stayed hot all day. I didn't empty one pot until the next day and was so surprised when I went to clean it that the contents were still hot! The liquid capacity is outstanding. I didn't have to refill either during this particular party. The cleanup-- even if you leave them overnight--was super easy. A little soapy water and wiping out and they are sparkly clean.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Work coffee options just got better
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for work. So far we have only used once but the product does exactly what we want. Seems to be of very good quality, and it’s easy to use. Definitely keeps coffee hot for a while. UPDATE: we are still happy with the carafe, but it does not keep coffee hot, much less warm, for the advertised 12 hours. Most I have observed is 4 hours. But the rest of the evaluation earlier is valid, and our group goes through coffee fast enough that the retention is not as big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: piratejj04

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Awesome. However you can buy these at Walmart ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Awesome. However you can buy these at Walmart and Sams Club at a lower price. I picked up two there. Gonna get some more from Sams club
customer_reviews.author: me myself and I

customer_reviews.title: Must pre-heat airpot before use?
customer_reviews.text: Instructions say preheating the airpot with hot water for 15 minutes before use helps keep the heat in your beverage. When entertaining I have way too much to do all ready to take the time to do this. Gave it one try and it's just not convenient to do. Good size, will find another use other than hot beverages.
customer_reviews.author: S.Shev

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. Very beautiful, big size. Please before use boil water and pour into product let it sit for 10 min and pour out this shall prepare the product if any faults return to amazon So far great, love it
customer_reviews.author: Pvstr

customer_reviews.title: Love this, made a get together so much easier than standing over my 4 cup coffee maker all night
customer_reviews.text: Really like this pot! It's so easy to use. I didn't even need to read the instructions lol I'm the only coffee drinker in my house and just have a little pot. I was able to make coffee for 10+ people ahead of time. Stayed hot for hours. super!
customer_reviews.author: rodney byers jr

customer_reviews.title: Buy the larger (3L) one, the dispenser is much better.
customer_reviews.text: Wife is super happy with this thing. We ordered the smaller size by mistake first, and noticed the dispenser is much better on the larger (3L) one. They're the same price, so if size is not an issue, I'd recommend buying the larger of the two. Overall construction is solid, and the sellers seem to be good people running a small business. Returning the smaller one for the larger size was hassle free.
customer_reviews.author: Syed I. Hashmi

customer_reviews.title: Great airpot
customer_reviews.text: Between my wife and I, we drink a gallon of coffee per day. I have only been using this airpot for two days, but it is great compared to the airpots that have the large push button on top. The lever makes it easy to use and it only takes two pumps to fill a 14 oz cup. The top is easily removed for cleaning. I intend to update this review after I have been using the airpot for a month.
customer_reviews.author: v92tc

customer_reviews.title: Keeps water HOT!
customer_reviews.text: I preheated my pot for 10 minutes, drained, then filled with boiling water and it was still steaming 24 hours later!!! Used these for my wedding to do hot chocolate and they did NOT disappoint! I bought 2 and LOVE them.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Stanphill

customer_reviews.title: Works, but difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: I used it for hot apple cider and it worked great! I am super pleased with how long it stayed hot, and just how hot it was. It was piping hot, not lukewarm, for hours. I did follow other reviewers directions to fill it with hot water first. But, there is one downside; it is a little difficult to clean. I'll have to find a longer bottle brush and a longer straw cleaner to get it good and clean inside. But all in all it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Maku

customer_reviews.title: good airpot
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use for a party. It was very useful. Kept coffee warm all day - at least 10 hours. It was easy to use. I can't attest to durability because I have only had it about a week, but it seems to be fine. It was pretty easy to clean - none of them are really easy to reach into but it was as good as it gets, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne B

customer_reviews.title: Great for transporting and keeping liquids hot
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a hot chocolate bar for my daughters ice skating birthday party. It was perfect. It kept the hot chocolate really hot for hours. I made the hot chocolate at about 2:00 in the afternoon and it was still hot when I cleaned it out at 9:00 that night. I can’t wait to try it with cold tea or lemonade this summer.
customer_reviews.author: maggie claire

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This airpot is exactly as described and exactly what I wanted - keeps the coffee hot!
customer_reviews.author: Molly May

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to use, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: This product was perfect for our Grand Opening event. The pump worked perfectly, the "tank" holds much more than a single pot of coffee. It can be used for many other drinks as well. We received it in a timely manner and it arrived in perfect condition. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M. Robicheaux

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for use at baby shower, it was great. Coffee was still very hot after 8 hrs. Easy to clean but it’s cleaner with a soft bottle brush. We live in heavy storm area this will be great to fill before power goes out so we will have hot water for tea or coffee.
customer_reviews.author: vickie l graif

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband's old thermal carafe has started to leak. So I got this for him. This is big and easy to use. I think it's too big to carry around when you travel. But it can keep temperature outside though.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: At first I really liked this product, but it only worked for a short period of time and then, inexplicably, it stopped keeping my coffee hot.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Punt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for dinner/parties
customer_reviews.text: We used it at a party at a dinner and what a delight that everyone has second round of cup of hot tea.
customer_reviews.author: Sadia

customer_reviews.title: This Carafe worked great!
customer_reviews.text: We used this at our son's wedding and worked amazing. Kept the coffee very hot on a very could night. The Carafe was left outside, overnight in 30 degree temp. and the coffee was still warm the next day when I retrieved it to clean. I was very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.text: I researched this item and really wanted to like it but this one just doesn’t work. We all know how a vacuum bottle works - pour hot water in, wait a period of time, the manufacturer says 10 minutes, then place your beverage in, specifically for me, coffee. Then it keeps it hot. It didn’t do the job. The outside of the container got hot, telling me it was dissipating heat. My Thermos never feels hot to the touch. This one didn’t work. Either I got a bad one or don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Rabe

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Product Works!
customer_reviews.text: I heated up water for a catering event I did over an hour away from my location and didn't start to serve until almost 3 hour after I initially filled the carafes. I think the water actually got hotter while sitting in the carafes! This is an excellent product and served its purpose very well!
customer_reviews.author: Wunprophet

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought this airpot more than a year ago and never had a problem with the pump, unlike other models and brands we had bought before. It is a bit more expensive but worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nat L

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service and High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Cresimo 101 Oz (3L) Airpot, and I received a scratched one. When I emailed the Customer service, they emailed back promptly and sent me a new one. I use it for outdoor and camping, it keeps the hot water and tea for at least 6 hours tongue burning. I like it so much because inside made of steel, NOT plastic or glass.
customer_reviews.author: Armiti

customer_reviews.title: air pump failed
customer_reviews.text: The air pump was very weak. I gave up after a few weeks and bought a different brand. I took the lid apart to find the plastic accordion looking part that pumps air had a tear on the seam making the whole pot useless for its purpose to dispense coffee. If that had not failed, I would say it is an attractive airpot, and kept coffee hot.
customer_reviews.author: Notyours

customer_reviews.title: Hot for this Product.
customer_reviews.text: I belong to a football tailgate group. I wanted to serve hot drinks at the last game of the season. I purchased the Airpot 3L coffee carafe to do so. I loved it so much, I bought a second one! I used both to served hot chocolate drinks at my Christmas party!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. Keeps hot water hot for a while- I preheated the carafe to allow longer heat time. Great purchase- have used several times.
customer_reviews.author: Jill R

customer_reviews.title: Thermos
customer_reviews.text: It says stays HOT for 12 hrs? Maybe? How about luke warm after 12 or more hours, still have to try it fOr cold beverage
customer_reviews.author: hole in one

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price... this is the carafe you’ve been looking for.
customer_reviews.text: These carafes work wonderfully, look nice, and make serving coffee (or any beverage) to a group so easy! The coffee stayed hot for the entire day. I only wish I had purchased them sooner! The company and their customer service were amazing as well, sending me emails before my order arrived with helpful tips on how to get the best performance from the product. They followed up with me afterward and were quick to respond. Would definitely recommend and purchase more of these without hesitation!! A great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Lanae Leaman

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I use a daily and found that it is extremely handy. I can take it with me to my shop or office and coffee stays hot for an acceptable duration of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Dispenser doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't a good buy. I'm returning it today. I just got it a few days ago. I made coffee for company I was having, but the pump dispenser didn't work? You have to pump it repeatedly, and then you still just get a small amount of coffee. I don't recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Fareeda

customer_reviews.title: DISSAPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: THE ADVERTIZING SAYS THAT IT WILL KEEP COFFE HOT FOR TWELVE HOURS; I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW YOUR DEFINITION OF HOT ? I FILLED THE CARAF WITH VERY HOT TAP WATER. LET IT SIT WHILE I BOILED A BIG KETTLE OF HOT WATER. I EMPTIED THE TAP WATER AND FILLED THE CARAFE WITH ALMOST BOILING WATER. AS SOON AS MY TWELVE CUP COFFEE MACHINE FINISHED ITS CYCLE I AGAIN EMPTIED THE CARAFE AND PUT IN MY FRESH, HOT COFFEE. THIS ALL HAPPANS AT ABOUT 9:00 A.M. BY 2:30 - 3:00 OC'CLOCK IN THE AFTERNOON THE COFFEE NO LONGER MEETS MY DEFINITION OF HOT. I WOULD NOT BUY THIS CARAFE AGAIN. THANK YOU, GENE GNIDA
customer_reviews.author: GENE GNIDA

customer_reviews.title: Love this Coffee Carafe!
customer_reviews.text: The lever much easier to use than what is often found on pump pots. The whole unit is easy to fill and wash. Coffee stays hot too! The company also sent an email with tips on how to use the carafe and how to keep coffee or other hot beverages at optimum temperature. A nice touch. It arrived quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Murray

customer_reviews.title: Not for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thermos thinking that it is leak proof, but it's not. Otherwise, it kept our tea boiling hot for hours. Considering the price I paid for "used" item, which was not, i got a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Stranger

customer_reviews.title: Great Pot, Great Service
customer_reviews.text: This pot was just perfect for our needs. At 3 liters is is larger than many others - great for 12-15 people with regular sized coffee cups. This was a last minute order and we needed it VERY quickly - like two day! We live in a smaller town and that can't usually be accommodated... well, it was! A great vendor and wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: nmgirl68

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really love the airpot carafe, it’s very easy to clean and it keeps my coffee warm for a very long time. My group members love it, I can’t count the amount of compliments I get. I’m really thinking about getting another one, it’s so worth more than what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Tine201

customer_reviews.title: but it didn't keep the coffee as hot as I would have liked. It is still a nice addition to the ...
customer_reviews.text: The pot keeps things warm but not hot as I had hoped. I followed the instructions using hot water to preheat the put, but it didn't keep the coffee as hot as I would have liked. It is still a nice addition to the shop, I just make smaller pots of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Waited for this unit and was very disappointed with it
customer_reviews.text: No troubleshooting come with the unit. It took me 20 pumps to get a cup of water to come out of unit. I made sure everything was seating properly and still small squirts would only come out. Waited for this unit and was very disappointed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: These seem like a very nice product. Stainless steel exterior and generally well made. The seller contacted us with detailed instructions around the time we received it in the mail. They were very helpful. GREAT service, GREAT product!
customer_reviews.author: Sigpaw

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks warm a long time.  Made at night and still warm in morning.
customer_reviews.text: A bit hard to get down inside it and clean it. Keeps drinks very warm for a long time. Love the product.
customer_reviews.author: jamiejones75

customer_reviews.title: Piping hot for hours!
customer_reviews.text: I Love my Coffee Carafe! It keeps my coffee piping hot for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: DolphinChaser

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! This came in so handy during the holidays. I was debating whether to purchase the airpot, but I’m so glad I did! It’s easy to use, the little ones in our family used it to serve themselves hot coco. It’s a convenient product that makes entertaining an ease.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic Quality
customer_reviews.text: Expected more from this. The most disappointing thing is that it feels like cheap plastic - the kind that will break with a bit of pressure. Used it for brunch to serve chai and always feel that it has a bit of a smell lingering even after a few washes.
customer_reviews.author: Mytho fan

customer_reviews.title: The lever top snapped the first time we used it.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe a defective unit? I don't know. But, it snapped at the hinge the first time we used it. Unfortunately, we did not use it until the return window has passed. Garbage now, unless the seller offers to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps liquid hot all day
customer_reviews.text: We were impressed with how long the water stayed hot in the Airpot. We filled it with hot water one morning. By the next morning it was still somewhat warm. Not hot, but definitely warmer than we thought it would be. Super easy to use
customer_reviews.author: S. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Keeps liquids hot for hours!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect purchase for tailgating in November. I put steaming hot cider in it at 8:00 in the morning and at 4:00 that afternoon, the cider was STILL hot! We certainly needed it when the sun went down. The ease of serving made spilling accidents preventable.
customer_reviews.author: NF

customer_reviews.title: Does What it Says
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Keeps the coffee hot for hours and is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this air-pot !
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I have bought in awhile!! The air pot definitely keeps coffee hot for hours!! It holds almost 2 full pots of coffee. It worked great for the holidays. Brewed coffee before guests arrived and had hot coffee available whenever they wanted. Love this air -pot!!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Fadden

customer_reviews.title: Fantabulous
customer_reviews.text: Holds plenty and keeps it hot for a long time. Sturdy construction. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucious Prime

customer_reviews.title: Finally! An Airpot that actually does what it promises!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several different brands and sizes of Airpots and this unit is by far the best! The large size and exceptional insulation have exceeded all my expectations. Without pre-cooling the Airpot, my staff and I have enjoyed ice cold tea all week, emptying leftover ice to make a new batch at the start of the next day. I simply could not ask for better customer service and quicker delivery. I plan on purchasing a second unit for hot beverages.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described, we love it
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, keeps liquids hot for a long time, easy clean up and use. The coasters also pivot for easy use. The only downside is that sometimes the nozzle leaks a bit after a pour, so best to have a trivet under, but this wasn't a big deal to us.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Tietg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent at keeping coffee hot all day
customer_reviews.text: The thermos came one day after it was ordered. The fastest I have ever received a product purchased through Amazon. I purchased it in anticipation of an event that was being hosted. I set up the thermos around 9am and around 10pm that night I finally had the chance to empty and clean it. The coffee was still hot. Excellent buy! It can be a little challenging to clean as the top is connected to the thermos and kept slipping shut on me as I was trying to wash it out. But I am already thinking of buying another of the same model to have one for regular and one for decaf coffee!
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Great storage or warm/cold water to fill up many many cups of whatever is needed.
customer_reviews.text: Holds a great deal of warm water and fills up a lot of cups. Follow the instructions to get the best use out of it, but it works well and is a great value for the money. Company also provides a lot of follow-up and support.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Berkusenko

product_meta.title: Cresimo 101 Oz (3L) Airpot Thermal Coffee Carafe and Coffee Server/Lever Action/Stainless Steel Insulated Flask / 12 Hour Heat Retention / 24 Hour Cold Retention (Airpot)
feature_bullets: LONG HEAT AND COLD RETENTION » Cresimo’s vacuum insulation technology locks in temperature to preserve flavour and freshness, that keeps beverages hot for 12 hours or cold for 24 hours.
QUALITY » Our double walled thermal airpot is made up of a durable 18/8 stainless steel interior and exterior, built to withstand the demands of everyday use.
PUMP ACTION POURING » Pour spout easily dispenses your beverages with a simple pump of the lever, making it easy for anyone to use.

USER FRIENDLY » Its large mouth opening makes filling and cleaning easy; it can even be used with ice for extra cold refreshment. It’s outer body stays cool to the touch when filled with hot liquids and is condensation-free with cold beverages

WORRY FREE LIFETIME WARRANTY » 100% Guarantee! If you are not completely satisfied, contact us immediately! This warranty is exclusive to sales through Cresimo only and purchases made through unauthorized re-sellers will not be covered by this same manufacturer’s warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,889 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
